title: Update info of a BC member

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json" .

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID of the Business Center's member.

parameters.name: user_role
parameters.description: New basic role for the user in this Business Center. Enum values: ADMIN : Admins can manage the Business Center's members and assets. STANDARD : Standard members can only work on the ad accounts they've been assigned to.

parameters.name: ext_user_role
parameters.description: Advanced role of the user in the Business Center other than basic role, this is optional.

parameters.name: finance_role
parameters.description: New finance role of the user. Enum values: ANALYST : Finance Analysts can view, export, and download payment transaction records for all ad accounts owned or created by the Business Center. MANAGER : Finance Managers have all the permissions as the Finance Analyst, and have the access to a series of editing permissions, which they can use to make payments, top up ad accounts, and modify contact information for billing and invoicing, for all of the ad accounts owned or created by the Business Center.
